column4: With the ALTERNATE install, is exim installed by default or do you have to add the package after?
tapout: did you alter your css?

I haven't edited anything.  Just installed ubuntu, opened firefox.. asked about it yesterday, someone said install msfonts... Opened firefox again, hit yahoo.com and can't read the text without eye strain
not really an ubuntu question or issue, but using Ctrl-mousewheel you can adjust the scale temporarily, or edit your custom css sheet for your particular needs
